// 移位盒
uint64_t sab[64] = {
    0X8000000000000000LL, 0X4000000000000000LL, 0X2000000000000000LL, 0X1000000000000000LL, 0X800000000000000LL, 0X400000000000000LL,

    0X1000000000LL, 0X800000000LL, 0X400000000LL, 0X200000000LL, 0X100000000LL, 0X80000000LL, 0X40000000LL, 0X20000000LL, 0X10000000LL, 
    0X8000000LL, 0X4000000LL, 0X2000000LL, 0X1000000LL, 0X800000LL, 0X400000LL, 0X200000LL, 0X100000LL, 0X80000LL, 0X40000LL, 
    0X20000LL, 0X10000LL, 0X8000LL, 0X4000LL, 0X2000LL, 0X1000LL, 0X800LL, 0X400LL, 0X200LL, 
    0X100LL, 0X80LL, 0X40LL, 0X20LL, 0X10LL, 0X8LL, 0X4LL, 0X2LL, 0X1LL

// 移位盒
uint64_t sab[64] = {
    0X1LL, 0X2LL, 0X4LL, 0X8LL, 0X10LL, 0X20LL, 0X40LL, 0X80LL, 0X100LL, 0X200LL, 0X400LL, 0X800LL, 0X1000LL, 0X2000LL, 0X4000LL,

// E -
const int EE_box[48] = {
     1, 32, 31, 30, 29, 28, 29, 28, 27, 26, 25, 24,
    25, 24, 23, 22, 21, 20, 21, 20, 19, 18, 17, 16,
    17, 16, 15, 14, 13, 12, 13, 12, 11, 10,  9,  8,
     9,  8,  7,  6,  5,  4,  5,  4,  3,  2,  1, 32
}; 
const int EE_box[48] = { 
     0, 31, 30, 29, 28, 27, 28, 27, 26, 25, 24, 23,
    24, 23, 22, 21, 20, 19, 20, 19, 18, 17, 16, 15,
    16, 15, 14, 13, 12, 11, 12, 11, 10,  9,  8,  7, 
     8,  7,  6,  5,  4,  3,  4,  3,  2,  1,  0, 31
};
